alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:09PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Umatilla County through 545 PM PDT... At 508 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Rieth, or 10 miles west of Pendleton, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pendleton, Rieth and western Umatilla Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon
